RevisionEvent.Note: Only known prior ReleaseDate of the metadata
Added PublicationInfo. Added ResourceType and NamingAuthority. ZCB

ResourceHeader.Description: This data set contains information collected by the Ulysses Cosmic Dust instrument on the dust environment in interplanetary space within the inner solar system, between Jupiter and the Sun, and at high polar latitudes of the Sun. Both interplanetary and interstellar dust particles have been detected. This information is collected with a dust impact experiment, from which may be inferred direction of motion, mass, velocity and charge (see ULYDINST.CAT). The data presented in this dataset include instrumental readouts, inferred metadata, calibration information and a calendar of events.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the Ulysses team and the National Space Science Data Center.

PublicationInfo.PublishedBy: Planetary Data System; Space Physics Data Facility; European Space Astronomy Centre
